title: Two states
description: Given an array, return the maximum of the array.

title: String reversal
description: Write a function to reverse a given string.

title: Palindrome check
description: Write a function to check if a given string is a palindrome.

title: Factorial
description: Write a function to calculate the factorial of a given number.

title: Array sum
description: Write a function to calculate the sum of all elements in an array.

title: FizzBuzz
description: Write a program that prints the numbers from 1 to 100. But for multiples of three, print 'Fizz' instead of the number and for the multiples of five, print 'Buzz'. For numbers which are multiples of both three and five, print 'FizzBuzz'.

title: Prime number check
description: Write a function to check if a given number is prime.

title: Unique elements
description: Write a function to return only the unique elements from an array.

title: Array sorting
description: Write a function to sort an array of numbers in ascending order.

title: String capitalization
description: Write a function to capitalize the first letter of each word in a given string.
